name: Granny!
description:
◆ Granny ◆ is one of the entertaining application to prank your colleagues in Augmented Reality environment. While the victim is playing, a demon creature suddenly jump out with unexpected scary sound and the Victim is also being secretly video recorded ;)

INSTRUCTIONS
1. Turn up the volume
2. Start app and click on AR Camera button.
3. Bring the victim to a quiet area where he/she can focus e.g dark silent room.
4. Hand the app to the victim you wish to scare.
5. Ask victim to find girl character in Camera and look for few seconds.
6. Wait for few seconds.
7. You got their scared moment captured on Video.

If you like this app please rate it on the app store. This motivates us to make our apps even better. Thank you very much!

PLEASE: Do not show this app to people under 12 or people with faint of heart. Also - most people will drop the phone - beware of this! Best if people are sitting down.

▶ DISCLAIMER ◀
Authors of this application do not take responsibility of any results using this application.
